elements.name: As a user, I can login to the application and create an activity using manual entry mode

steps.name: The application is loaded
I enter "{{TEST_USERNAME}}" in the "username" text field
I enter "{{TEST_PASSWORD}}" in the "password" text field
I click on the button that has a value of "Login"
the application page is loaded
I click on the link that contains text "Create Activity"
I click on the link that contains text "Manual Entry"
I enter "Evening Run" in the text field with the ID "name"

steps.name: I tick the radio with name "visibility" and value "2"
I enter "19" in the text field with the ID "distance"
I enter "133" in the text field with the ID "elevationInMeters"
I enter "1" in the text field with the ID "durationH"
I enter "11" in the text field with the ID "durationM"
I enter "34" in the text field with the ID "durationS"
I enter "This was a great run with @Friend" in the text field with the ID "notes"
I click on the button that has a value of "Add Activity >>"
The success notification says "Successfully created activity"
The page heading says "Evening Run"
The "Distance" dashcard has the value of "30.58"
The "Elevation" dashcard has the value of "133"
The "Duration" dashcard has the text of "01:11:34"
I delete all activities of this user via the REST API

steps.name: I enter "Evening Run" in the text field with the ID "name"
I tick the radio with name "visibility" and value "2"
I click on the button that has a value of "Add Activity >>"
The success notification says "Successfully created activity"
The page heading says "Evening Run"
I enter "This is a good run mate, keep it going!" in the text field with the ID "comment"
I click on the button that has a value of "Add Comment >>"
I verify that there is a comment "This is a good run mate, keep it going!"
I delete all activities of this user via the REST API

elements.name: As a user, I can login to the application and search for activities

steps.name: The application is loaded
I enter "{{TEST_USERNAME}}" in the "username" text field
I enter "{{TEST_PASSWORD}}" in the "password" text field
I click on the button that has a value of "Login"
the application page is loaded
I click on the link that contains text "Create Activity"
I click on the link that contains text "Manual Entry"
I enter "Very Random Name 123" in the text field with the ID "name"
I click on the button that has a value of "Add Activity >>"
The success notification says "Successfully created activity"
The page heading says "Very Random Name 123"
I click on the link that contains text "Search"
I enter "Very Random Name 123" in the text field with the ID "search_query"
I verify that there is atleast 1 search result
I delete all activities of this user via the REST API

elements.name: As a user, I can login to the application

steps.name: The application is loaded
I enter "{{TEST_USERNAME}}" in the "username" text field
I enter "{{TEST_PASSWORD}}" in the "password" text field
I click on the button that has a value of "Login"
the application page is loaded
The page heading says "My Activities"

elements.name: As a user, I try to edit my profile

steps.name: The application is loaded
I enter "{{TEST_USERNAME}}" in the "username" text field
I enter "{{TEST_PASSWORD}}" in the "password" text field
I click on the button that has a value of "Login"
the application page is loaded
I click on the link that contains text "Hey "
I enter "Bruce Wayne" in the text field with the ID "name"
I enter "bruce@gotham.com" in the text field with the ID "email"
I enter "76.2" in the text field with the ID "weightInKg"
I click on the button that has a value of "Update Profile >>"
The success notification says "Successfully updated your profile"
I reload application
I click on the link that contains text "Hey Bruce"
I verify the text field with ID "email" contains "bruce@gotham.com"
I verify the text field with ID "weightInKg" contains "76.2"
I verify the text field with ID "name" contains "Bruce Wayne"
I enter "" in the text field with the ID "name"
I enter "" in the text field with the ID "email"
I enter "" in the text field with the ID "weightInKg"
I click on the button that has a value of "Update Profile >>"
The success notification says "Successfully updated your profile"
